casebody.data:
SCHENKEL & SHULTZ
v.
FOX & ASSO. No. 631A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2007. Samuel T. Reaves, Charlotte, Herbert W. Hamilton, Christi P. Cox, for Schenkel & Shultz. Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Troy Chivers. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of January 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Defendant (Fox & Associates) shall have up to and including the 23rd day of January 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of January 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
